t: Prayer to God in Time of Trouble
Vindicate*pn me, O God, And*ld plead my cause against an ungodly nation; Oh,*ld deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man!
For*ld You are*i the God of my strength; Why*ld do You cast me off? Why*ld do I go mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
Oh,*ln send out Your light and Your truth! Let*ld them lead me; Let*ld them bring me to Your holy hill And*ld to Your tabernacle.
Then*ld I will go to the altar of God, To*ld God my exceeding joy; And*ld on the harp I will praise You, O*ld God, my God.
Why*ln are you cast down, O my soul? And*ld why are you disquieted within me? Hope*ld in God; For*ld I shall yet praise Him, The*ld help of my countenance and my God.
